en.title: calculate your logia

about.title: what are we doing here?
features: 1 at the moment you were born, the universe was in a specific configuration — one that could only occur again if time itself were infinite.
2 this configuration serves as a map, composed of a vast set of variables that define the core attributes shaping your existence and choices.
3 with this cosmic blueprint, we will unveil the mysteries of the past and decode the future — through our groundbreaking new language.

en.disclaimer: if you don't know your exact time and place of birth, you can still get a general sense of your logia, but some features may not function as intended
